## Task & Objectives

The prompt for this map was for **Day Ten** of the 2023 [30 Day Map Challenge](https://30daymapchallenge.com/), which designated "North America" for the main subject.

## Tools & Workflow

Data were downloaded from the Global Biodiversity Information Facility. Map creation was performed in R/Studio. Blog post coming soon!
